newsitem.title: MEXICO: Lucent to invest more than $50 million in Mexico.
newsitem.headline: Lucent to invest more than $50 million in Mexico.

text.p: Lucent Technologies Inc. will invest more than $50 million in 1997 to expand its plant in Guadalajara, Mexico, the company's director for the country said Monday.
Lucent, a former unit of AT&T Corp., is a major provider of telecommunications systems, and sees double-digit growth in Mexico.

"We are growing the double digits... more than 20 percent. We are now negotiating the sale of private networks with Avantel and we will continue to sell equipment to Telmex," Rolando Zubiran told reporters.
Lucent's stock rose 37.5 cents to $43.625 on the New York Stock Exchange at mid-afternoon.
